authors.name: Andrea R Daniel
authors.note: This protocol was adapted from the work of Sean McCutcheon and colleagues in the Gersbach lab at Duke University.

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hjp6","text":"This protocols describes methods for characterizing the activity of dSaCas9 as a repressor using promoter tiling guide RNA screens in primary human T cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: CRISPRi, dSaCas9, B2M, CD2, tiling screen
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"edl72","text":"McCutcheon, S.R., Swartz, A.M., Brown, M.C. et al. Transcriptional and epigenetic regulators of human CD8+ T cell function identified through orthogonal CRISPR screens.Nat Genet (2023). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41588-023-01554-0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":44,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":168,"length":9},{"style":"sup","offset":105,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"18ht4","text":"Isolated CD8+ T cells from individual donors were obtianed directly from vials purchased from StemCell Technologies. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"el428","text":"Culture T cells were in PRIME-XV T cell Expansion XSFM (FujiFilm) supplemented with 5% human platelet lysate (Compass Biomed), 100 U ml−1 penicillin and 100 μg ml−1 streptomycin. All media were supplemented with 100 U ml−1 human IL-2 (Peprotech). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Designing CD2 and BM2 CRISPRi gRNA libraries
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"60lue","text":"Saturation CD2 and B2M CRISPRi gRNA libraries were designed to tile a 1,050-bp window (−400 bp to 650 bp) around the transcription start site (TSS) of each target gene using CRISPick61. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":19,"length":3},{"style":"sup","offset":182,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":182,"length":2}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"97670AC88FAB11EE94090A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41588-023-01554-0#ref-CR61"}}}}

steps.section: Designing CD2 and BM2 CRISPRi gRNA libraries
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1kvvn","text":"Each gRNA library was designed to target dSaCas9’s relaxed protospacer adjacent motif (PAM) variant: 5′-NNGRRN-3′. NT gRNAs were generated for each library to match the nucleotide composition of the targeting gRNAs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Designing CD2 and BM2 CRISPRi gRNA libraries
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bakgc","text":"CD2 and B2M gRNA libraries are available in Supplementary Table 1 of McCutcheon et al. Nature Genetics, 2023. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41588-023-01554-0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":87,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fedeg","text":"Oligonucleotide pools containing variable gRNA sequences and constant regions for polymerase chain reaction (PCR) amplification were synthesized by Twist Bioscience. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cp","text":"gRNA amplicons were gel extracted, PCR purified and input into 20 μl Gibson reactions (5:1 molar ratio of insert to backbone) with 200 ng of Esp3I digested and 1 × solid-phase reversible immobilization (SPRI)-selected (Beckman Coulter) plasmid backbone, pLV hU6-gRNA hUbC-dSaCas9-KRAB-T2A-Thy1.1 (Addgene 194278).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tlrr","text":"Gibson reactions were purified using ethanol precipitation and transformed into Lucigen’s Endura ElectroCompetent Cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai935","text":"Transformed cells were cultured overnight and plasmids were isolated using Qiagen Midi Kits.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5kvo","text":"CD8+ T cells from pooled peripheral blood mononuclear cell donors (see step 1) were transduced with all-in-one lentivirus encoding for dSaCas9–KRAB–2A–GFP and either CD2 or B2M gRNA libraries.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":3,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8cari","text":"Lentiviral supernatant was centrifuged at 600g for 10 min to remove cellular debris and concentrated to 50–100× the initial concentration using Lenti-X Concentrator (Takara Bio). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":45,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aui04","text":"T cells were transduced at 5–10% v/v of concentrated lentivirus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g33p","text":"Following transduction, cells were expanded for 9 days and then stained for the target gene.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f89mh","text":"An SH800 FACS Cell Sorter (Sony Biotechnology) was used for cell sorting and analysis. Fluorescent minus one (FMO) controls were used to set appropriate gates for all flow panels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8le45","text":"For antibody staining of surface markers, cells were collected, spun down at 300g for 5 min, resuspended in flow buffer (1× phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), 2 mM ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid and 0.5% bovine serum albumin) with the appropriate antibody dilutions and incubated for 30 min at 4 °C on a rocker. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":80,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f9oa","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rdog","text":"                
  Antibody
  Target
  Fluorophore/Sequence
  Clone
  Isotype
  Dilution
  Application

  Catalog #
  
  CD2

  RPA-2.10
  Mouse / IgG1, kappa

  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":310}],"data":{}},{"key":"4r4i","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","0_4":"","0_5":"","0_6":"","0_7":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","1_4":"","1_5":"","1_6":"","1_7":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","2_4":"","2_5":"","2_6":"","2_7":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[134,138,138,148,50,88,153,75],"data":[["Antibody
  Target","Fluorophore/Sequence","Clone","Isotype","Dilution","Application","Manufacturer","Catalog #"],["CD2","PE","RPA-2.10","Mouse / IgG1, kappa","1:50","Flow cytometry","Thermo","12-0029-42"],["B2M","PE","A17082A","Mouse IgG1, κ","1:50","Flow cytometry","Biolegend","395704"]],"guid":"78D338FDE154471C8F64A9D4B88F9549","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Antibody
  Target","Fluorophore/Sequence","Clone","Isotype","Dilution","Application","Manufacturer","Catalog #"],["CD2","PE","RPA-2.10","Mouse / IgG1, kappa","1:50","Flow cytometry","Thermo","12-0029-42"],["B2M","PE","A17082A","Mouse IgG1, κ","1:50","Flow cytometry","Biolegend","395704"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30ne4","text":"Cells were then washed with flow buffer, spun down at 300g for 5 min and resuspended in flow buffer for cell sorting or analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":57,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7qnl2","text":"Transduced cells in the lower and upper 10% tails of target gene expression were sorted for subsequent gRNA library construction and sequencing. All replicates were maintained and sorted at a minimum of 350× coverage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42lh","text":"Genomic DNA was isolated using Qiagen’s DNeasy Blood and Tissue Kit. Genomic DNA was split across 100 μl PCR reactions (25 cycles at 98 °C for 10 s, 60 °C for 30 s, and 72 °C for 20 s) with Q5 2× Master Mix and up to 1 μg of genomic DNA per reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbom7","text":"PCRs were pooled together for each sample and purified using double-sided (SPRI)bead selection at 0.6× and 1.8×. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aokrp","text":"Libraries were run on a High Sensitivity D1000 tape (Agilent) to confirm amplicon size and quantified using Qubit’s dsDNA High Sensitivity assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9e8or","text":"Libraries were diluted to 2 nM, pooled together at equal volumes, and sequenced using Illumina’s MiSeq Reagent Kit v2 (50 cycles).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6a2g8","text":"Primers are available in Supplementary Table 5 of McCutcheon et al. Nature Genetics, 2023. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41588-023-01554-0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":68,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0f8f","text":"FASTQ files were aligned to custom indexes for each gRNA library (generated from the bowtie2-build function) using Bowtie 2 (ref. 67). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":130,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":130,"length":2}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"998ACF538FAE11EE94090A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41588-023-01554-0#ref-CR67"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1m9r3","text":"Counts for each gRNA were extracted and used for further analysis in R.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmvc0","text":"Individual gRNA enrichment was determined using the DESeq2 (ref. 68) package to compare gRNA abundance between groups for each screen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":65,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":2}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B09942A48FAE11EE94090A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41588-023-01554-0#ref-CR68"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnrkb","text":"Lentivirus was produced as previously described60. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":2}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CF33144B8FAC11EE94090A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41588-023-01554-0#ref-CR60"}}}}

title: CRISPRi tiling screens
